elm.description: A delightful programming language for building reliable web applications!

hugo.name: Hugo
hugo.description: The world's fastest framework for building websites! The site you are on right now is powered by Hugo.

go.name: Go

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.description: I post video content on YouTube, because the format is a great way to show how to make something step-by-step.

netlify.name: Netlify
netlify.description: The most comprehensive platform for web projects. I use Netlify to host this site and almost _all_ of the projects I share.
